PARSE_DASHBOARD_APP_ID.description: A unique identifier for your app.

PARSE_DASHBOARD_MASTER_KEY.description: A key that overrides all permissions. Keep this secret.

PARSE_DASHBOARD_USER_ID.description: A key that overrides all permissions. Keep this secret.

PARSE_DASHBOARD_USER_PASSWORD.description: A key that overrides all permissions. Keep this secret.

PARSE_DASHBOARD_SERVER_URL.description: URL to connect to your Heroku instance

PARSE_DASHBOARD_ALLOW_INSECURE_HTTP.description: allow insecure http to your Heroku instance
